name: Pitango Venture Capital
overview: Pitango is one of Israel’s leading venture capital firms. They have helped cultivate over 100 companies in seed, early and expansion stage in a diversified range of technology sectors. They manage funds in excess of $1.3 billion in committed capital from well-established international investors from their offices in Israel and the Silicon Valley.
